item.title: Java Language Feature: Annotation
item.description: The annotation construct that facilitates all sorts of magic in Java. 1@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME) 2@Target({ElementType.TYPE_USE, ElementType.METHOD}) 3public @interface Foo { 4} 5 6@Foo 7Integer getMenaing() { 8return 42; 9} copy java.lang.Integer getMenaing(); descriptor: ()Ljava/lang/Integer; flags: (0x0000) Code: stack=1, locals=1, args_size=1 0: bipush 42 2: invokestatic #7 // Method java/lang/Integer.valueOf:(I)Ljava/lang/Integer; 5: areturn LineNumberTable: line 7: 0 LocalVariableTable: Start Length Slot Name Signature 0 6 0 this Lcc/Main; RuntimeVisibleAnnotations: 0: #23() cc.FG RuntimeVisibleTypeAnnotations: 0: #23(): METHOD_RETURN cc.
